entry.title: Aashirvaad Sugar Release Control Atta 1kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aashirvaad Atta
Type: Foods
Price: 57.60

The AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta is a ‘Natural Grain Mix’ of whole wheat Atta and several other healthy grain flours. It is one of the best atta options for diabetics due to its low Glycaemic Index. This slows down the sugar release in the human body which is highly beneficial for diabetics. Additionally, it also has severalnutritional benefits for all people owing to the presence of oats, methi, and other multigrain flours in this blend.

Key Information:

  • Main Ingredients: AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta has been designed with an optimal focus on retaining a ‘Low Glycaemic Index.’ This product contains whole wheat atta (84.5%), multigrain flour mixture (15.4%), and Fenugreek Seed Powder (0.1%)
  • Suitable For: This is ideal Atta for diabetics to enjoy their favourite food dishes without having to worry about their blood sugar. Alternatively, it can be used by any health-conscious individual and family. Its health benefits and superior nutrition can be a great addition to a healthy diet for everyone.
  • Usage: AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta can be used for a variety of dishes that are commonly made in Indian households and much more. It is an excellent substitute for whole wheat Atta and can be used to prepare delicious fluffy rotis, parathas, and puris. Furthermore, many special delicacies such as Sweet Pumpkin Puri, Whole Wheat Barfi, and Fried Whole Modaks can also be prepared with this healthy atta.
  • Quantity: A 1kg pack of AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta has enough quantity to make approximately 30-35 medium-sized rotis for a small family. A 1kg pack provides enough atta to prepare enough rotis for 4-5 days for a small family.


The AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta is a unique combination of flours to ensure it has a ‘Low Glycaemic Index.’ The mixture of high-quality whole wheat flour and legume and pulses flour results in a ‘Natural Grain Mix.’ Foods prepared with this Atta help release the sugar slowly into the body. This proves incredibly beneficial to diabetics, allowing them much better blood glucose control. In addition to being helpful to diabetics, AASHIRVAAD Sugar Release Control Atta also helps fitness enthusiasts regulate their diets much better. Improved weight management is one of the core health benefits of this product. It is the perfect substitute for regular whole wheat atta, making it an ideal product for diabetics and even other fitness-oriented individuals.

entry.title: Aashirvaad Shudh Chakki Atta 5kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aashirvaad Atta
Type: Foods
Price: 206.00

This is a 100 whole wheat atta prepared using the choicest grains. Its ingredients are directly sourced from the farmers to ensure a high-quality end product. The grains selected to make the Aashirvaad Whole Wheat Atta are heavy on the palm, golden amber in colour, and hard in bite. The process used for grinding the grains offer the right balance of colour, taste, and nutrition. No maida has been added to this atta to ensure you do not compromise on your family‚Äôs health. The dough made from this atta will give you soft rotis.

entry.title: Aashirvaad Salt, 1kg, Iodised Salt Made from Natural Sea Salt Crystals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aashirvaad Iodised Salt
Type: Foods
Price: 22.00

Aashirvaad ensures that only good quality ingredients reach your kitchen and Aashirvaad Iodised Salt stays true to that promise. Made from natural sea salt crystals with a 4-step advantage process, Aashirvaad Iodised Salt ensures that you and your family receive pure goodness of nature, daily.

Aashirvaad Iodised Salt is obtained by first, evaporating sea water or brine in shallow basins by sunlight and wind for 3 weeks. When the water evaporates, a salt bed forms at the bottom of the basin. This salt is then collected, and put through an elaborate cleansing process and finally, enriched with Iodine to take care of your family’s Iodine requirements.
The moisture-proof packaging ensures a free-flowing granular form that enables easy handling as well as clean storage.

Aashirvaad Iodised salt's 4 step advantange is what gives your meals a balanced, original taste - free of any impurities.
We take extra care to ensure that only quality salt reaches your home. Simply because we know that it is the only way you would have it!

  • Aashirvaad Iodised Salt is made with the 4-step advantage process which ensures its good quality.
  • Aashirvaad Iodised Salt is solar evaporated; sun-dried for 3 weeks and made from natural sea salt crystals to give you salt, just the way nature intended.
  • Aashirvaad Salt is has the right amount of iodine, which is vital for healthy physical growth and brain function. 
  • The salt undergoes a 2-step cleaning process and has a moisture-proof packaging which gives it a free-flowing texture.
  • This good quality salt ensures a balanced taste in your daily meals.

We bring to you recipes inspired from the Master Chefs of ITC Hotels. entry.title: Aashirvaad Select Sharbati Atta 5kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aashirvaad Atta
Type: Foods
Price: 295.00

The Sharbati wheat grain is considered to be one of India’s most valuable food resources due to its high quality and perfect texture. AASHIRVAAD Select Atta is only made from the most carefully selected Sharbati wheat grains. These wheat grains are sourced directly from the farmers of Madhya Pradesh to make sure that only the highest quality whole wheat flour is produced. The softest rotis in India are hand-made with love, hard work, and the exceptional quality of AASHIRVAAD Select Atta. These rotis stay softer for a long time, retaining their moisture for longer due to the higher water absorption rate of the Atta.

Key Information:

  • Main Ingredients: 100% Sharbati Wheat from Madhya Pradesh, 0% Maida. AASHIRVAAD Select Atta 5kg and all other packs are prepared using only the highest quality Sharbati wheat grains from MP.
  • Suitable For: The 5kg AASHIRVAAD Select Atta pack is an ideal choice for all individuals and families that wish to enjoy rotis that stay softer, and fluffy for a longer period.
  • Usage: The AASHIRVAAD Select Atta is best used for the perfect round and fluffy whole wheat rotis. It can also be used to prepare parathas, bread, and many other Indian flatbread delicacies like naans, puris, litti chokha, dal bati churma, and many other baked goodies.
  • Quantity: An average family of three can consume up to 10-12 rotis each day. Therefore, one pack of AASHIRVAAD Select 5kg Atta can last for at least one week, or seven days.

AASHIRVAAD Select Atta is made of superior Sharbati wheat, which is directly sourced from the finest fields in the country. The grains are selected in a way that it is consistent in size and has a golden sheen to it, which makes it ‘truly select’. These carefully picked grains account for the extra flavor and texture of the rotis prepared using Select Atta. Furthermore, AASHIRVAAD’s world-class mechanized technology used for packaging ensures that the product is untouched by hands, and the nutrition is locked intact in the Atta. This lets you, and your family enjoy rotis, that is equally tasty and hygienic

entry.title: Aashirvaad Select Sharbati Atta 1kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aashirvaad Atta
Type: Foods
Price: 60.00

A premium quality product by AASHIRVAAD, Select Atta is made from the authentic Sharbati wheat, which is regarded to be the King of Wheat. The ITC experts handpick the Sharbati grains used to prepare the Atta from the Sehore region of Madhya Pradesh. These choicest grains from Sehore ensures that the Atta you get is of high quality. Thus, the rotis made using Select Atta stay soft for longer and has a delightful aroma to it. 

Key Information:

  • Main Ingredients- Select Atta is made using 100% MP Sharbati wheat, that is harvested to perfection by showering the right amount of sunlight and rain.  
  • Suitable for – Anyone who wants to relish some tasty, soft rotis made from the choicest Sharbati wheat can choose this Atta.  
  • Usage - The Sharbati Atta has a mildly sweet flavor. Though it can be well used for making the daily staples like puris and rotis, you can try other food varieties like Masala Khakra, Crispy Masala Puri or Whole Wheat Muthiya.
  • Quantity- You can prepare approximately 30-40 rotis using AASHIRVAAD Select Atta 1 Kg. This will be sufficient for a family of four to be served for dinner, for 5-6 days approximately.

AASHIRVAAD Select Atta is made of superior Sharbati wheat, which is directly sourced from the finest fields in the country. The grains are selected in a way that it is consistent in size and has a golden sheen to it, which makes it ‘truly select’. These carefully picked grains account for the extra flavor and texture of the rotis prepared using Select Atta. Furthermore, AASHIRVAAD’s world-class mechanized technology used for packaging ensures that the product is untouched by hands, and the nutrition is locked intact in the Atta. This lets you, and your family enjoy rotis, that is equally tasty and hygienic

entry.title: Aashirvaad Chilli Powder 500g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aashirvaad Spices
Type: Foods
Price: 162.00

AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder is made with the crisp, dried, and thoroughly cleaned red chillies. Only the most high quality red chillies are sourced, cleaned, and ground to prepare AASHIRVAAD Red Chilli Powder. No added flavours or colours are used in the preparation of this trusted product that retains its original spicy taste, and vibrant red colour.

Key Information:

  • Main Ingredients: AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder is an authentic product that is prepared with natural, sun-dried red chillies. The red chillies are ground meticulously in order to ensure there are no impurities in the final product.
  • Suitable For: An incredibly well-suited product for spice lovers, AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder not only adds a fiery touch but also brings a vivacious colour to the food. AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder is a suitable product for all Indian homes, and other commercial food undertakings such as restaurants, fast food joints, and more.
  • Usage: Add AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder to curries, vegetables, meat dishes, snacks, and many other wholesome foods made at home. Since AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder is prepared with nothing but whole red chillies, the product retains the natural spicy properties of red chillies.
  • Quantity: This pack of AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder weighs 500g. This quantity is sufficient for a small family to use for their daily meal needs.

Red Chilli Powder is one of the most commonly used spices in Indian food-making. It can be found in kitchens across the country, and each region uses the spice to add spice, colour, and a zest to their food. AASHIRVAAD Chilli Powder achieves its purity, and perfectly balanced colour and taste by sourcing the red chillies directly from the farmers. They are carefully selected by experts to their quality and are ground up using a traditional process.
